content: Why 'Slow Productivity' is the Answer to Burnout. In a world of constant pings, Cal Newport argues for doing fewer things at clarity. Deep work is the new superpower. #burnout #focus
author: Cal Newport

content: The Age of AI Surveillance: How privacy is becoming a luxury item. New algorithms track emotional states in real-time. We need a new ethics for the digital age. #privacy #ethics

content: Spending just 20 minutes in nature lowers cortisol levels by 15%. The science of forest bathing (Shinrin-yoku) is undeniable. Disconnect to reconnect. #nature #mentalhealth
author: Dr. S. Li
